OOC: okey

::Astroblast/Switchblade::
Astroblast docks with the Ark, his hatch opens. He waits for 
people to get out.

Switchblade tosses out a Spider, and begins controling it, to see if 
there are any traps, he looks carefully, so as to not miss anything.

On 1 Apr 2001, at 17:46, rAuq wrote:

> ::Astroblast::
> "Megatron, we've arrived at the Ark preparing for docking." The Ark 
> was big on his view screen. He fired once, just below the ship to 
> see if the shields were up, and in need of being taken down.
> 
>
